name: Truthfully Inaccurate [VR]
description:
Team: Studio 8ight

Jameel Patrick George Rahaman - contact@8ight.studio

Assets used: POLYGON Town, Ocean Community Plugin,  VR Integrator by W3 Studios and audio obtained from www.zapsplat.com

While it is far from complete and I would have liked to do much more with this concept but I must submit to meet the deadline, I do hope everyone that plays it enjoys it as much as I did making it :)

Best wishes to all,

Jimmy.
